name: Stock Value
description: the amount that Rockwell Automation considers to be the value of the given material that was sold to the customer for the total quantity sold for the given transaction, based on the valuation class for the material and the Material Unit Cost, stored as a decimal in the currency specified by the COPA Record Currency Code
Stock Value = Standard Unit Cost * Sales Order Delivered Quantity
